title: The Power of Remembering
itunes:title: The Power of Remembering
description:
The Bible records how God told his people to put down memorial stones. Stones of remembrance. These stones can help us remember the miracles God has done in our lives. When we remember the good things God has done, it helps us keep an attitude of thankfulness, faith, and expectancy.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
